title: What are the best options for residents to rent out their houses for the 2017 Wells Fargo PGA event?  Are there any city or county restrictions on short-term rentals?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/11/are-there-any-wilmington-or-new-hanover-county-restrictions-on-short-term-rentals-what-are-the-best-options-for-residents-to-rent-out-their-houses-for-the-2017-wells-fargo-pga-event/
